# Dedicated GPU Servers and Hosting

## A cost effective way to run high performance computations  
and train your machine learning models

  * Choose a GPU Accelerator
  * Configure a Server with Your Selected GPU
  * Get your custom server deployed in 2 to 24 hours

Check Available GPUs

## Available Nvidia GPU Accelerators

  * Nvidia A2 Tensor Core 
  * Nvidia A10 Tensor Core 
  * Nvidia A16 Tensor Core 
  * Nvidia Tesla P4 
  * Nvidia Quadro K2200 
  * Nvidia Quadro K4200 
  * Request Custom GPU 

####  Nvidia A2 Tensor Core

  * 1280 CUDA cores 
  * 16GB GDDR6 memory 

from $115,62 / mo ($0,20 / hr)

The NVIDIA A2 Tensor Core GPU offers cost-effective enterprise level
performance and adaptable inference acceleration to any server deployed at
scale. It accelerates inference performance up to 20x when compared with CPU-
only servers.

Configure Server

####  Nvidia A10 Tensor Core

  * 9216 CUDA cores 
  * 24GB GDDR6 memory 

from $252 / mo ($0,53 / hr)

The NVIDIA A10 Tensor Core GPU combines 2nd gen RT cores, 3rd gen Tensor cores
and new streaming microprocessors for versatile graphics, rendering, AI, and
compute performance for mainstream enterprise level servers.

Configure Server

Out of stock

####  Nvidia A16 Tensor Core

  * 5120 CUDA cores 
  * 64GB GDDR6 memory 

from $282.60 / mo ($0,48 / hr)

The NVIDIA A16 GPU is optimized for user density and enables graphics-rich
virtual PCs accessible from anywhere. It delivers more than double the encoder
throughput versus previous generation M10, providing the multiuser performance
required for streaming video and multimedia.

Join Waiting List

####  Nvidia Tesla P4

  * 2560 CUDA cores 
  * 8GB GDDR6 memory 

from $81.82 / mo ($0,16 / hr)

The NVIDIA Tesla P4 enables maximum GPU-per-server density for professional
graphics users, including those accessing deep learning inference workloads.
It delivers up to 1.3X the performance of previous-generation Tesla M60.

Configure Server

Out of stock

####  Nvidia Quadro K2200

  * 640 CUDA cores 
  * 4GB GDDR5 memory 

from $68 / mo ($0,13 / hr)

The NVIDIA Quadro K2200 delivers exceptional power-efficient 3D application
performance. Whether you’re developing revolutionary products or telling
spectacularly vivid visual stories, Quadro gives you the performance to do it
brilliantly.

Join Waiting List

Out of stock

####  Nvidia Quadro K4200

  * 1344 CUDA cores 
  * 4GB GDDR5 memory 

from $126 / mo ($0,24 / hr)

The NVIDIA Quadro K4200 delivers incredible 3D application performance and
capability, allowing you to take advantage of dual copy-engines for seamless
data movement between GPU and system memory—all in a flexible, single-slot
form factor.

Join Waiting List

####  Make a request for a specific GPU

After you make a custom GPU request we contact our suppliers to order your
wanted GPU, or offer you a suitable alternative at hand. Your account manager
will guide you through the process that takes up to 24 hours.

Request Custom GPU

## Servers That Support GPU Accelerators

Create your cheap GPU server by adding your chosen GPU accelerator to a
selected Dedicated Server

Plan

CPU

Memory

Storage

Network

Price

Show full server list

### Why our Dedicated GPU Cloud Servers?

We enable powerful cloud features on raw bare metal hardware, served on-
demand.  
No more inefficiency, noisy neighbors or complex pricing calculators.

###  Raw Compute Power

Single-tenant bare metal servers with no virtualization

###  Variety of GPUs

Choose from 4 available GPU accelerators online

###  In-memory computing

Add up to 1536GB RAM to your dedicated server

###  Secure Data Storage

Choose directly attached, block or object storage

###  Private Networking

Interconnect your servers on a robust 10G virtual LAN

###  Free Data Flow

Up to 100TB of free monthly traffic, and $0,5 / TB for more

## Most popular  
GPU server use cases

We empower small and medium businesses with massive parallel processing
capabilities, making graphical rendering, scientific modeling, machine
learning and other parallel computing solutions easily accessible. Whether you
need a single GPU server or whole GPU cluster, we can easily deliver ir in
minutes.

###  Deep Learning Models

Speed up linear algebra calculations to train your models quicker.

###  Graphical Design

Create 3D models or lift your video transcoding to another level.

###  GPU Servers For Gaming

Enjoy premium gaming experience with enhanced graphical rendering.

###  GPU Servers For Mining

Generate income by using GPU computing for crypto-currency mining.

### Cannot find a GPU?

Make a request for a specific GPU

After you make a custom GPU request we contact our suppliers to order your
wanted GPU, or offer you a suitable alternative at hand. Your account manager
will guide you through the process that takes up to 24 hours.

Request Custom GPU

Configure your new server with GPU accelerator now

Sign up

Contact us 24/7

US: +1 332 255 68 52

UK: +44 20 3734 1592

LT: +370 415 035 03

Sales: sales@cherryservers.com

Support: support@cherryservers.com

Abuse: abuse@cherryservers.com
